name: RPG Escape Room
description:
RPG ESCAPE ROOM is a unique indie RPG game mixed with an Escape Room style of game to give players a different experience from any other games. Players will be forced to use their brains, logics and creativity to the limit without having time to relax along the game. Your skill and ability in solving riddles and puzzles will be tested in this game. And it won't be easy because all the riddles and puzzles in this game is unique, full of surprise and challenging. So if you think you are skillful enough in solving puzzles or having some kind of detective ability, just challenge yourself to play this RPG ESCAPE ROOM

Minimum System Requirement :

OS: Windows 7/Vista

Processor: Intel Premium 4 2.0Ghz

Memory:512 MB RAM

Storage:500 MB available space
